Articles.Content:
nice l00!

can you update your ISRU mod?

I desperately need it for my grand tour of the Kerbol system

@ssTALONps: I will, but as EPS is backwards compatible at the top level, which ISRU uses, you should be able to simply upgrade

to EPS v0.3 and use ISRU as it is. It is possible the staging icon will be wrong, but other than that, it should work!

Cheers!
could you do a dropbox link aswell...mediafire refuses to let me download i click the button the arrow appears and thats all i dont get the save save as and open buttons

A question that can hopefully be easily answered. I downloaded the most recent version of this mod (0.7.1), which is fantastic overall.

But when i go to the VAB and the Utilities and Scientific tab, the DynaSat Large Zo2 tank, the ZO2 Tank small and the regular solar panels no longer are actionable. It indicates that "this part type isn't available in this version of KSP".

Is there something that i did wrong on the install side, or is there some kind of conflict with another program that i might need to be aware of?

Any help would be appreciated.

DynaSat is broken and has to be reconfigured.

I have the permission to do that, but Maraz didn't give a license so I can't republish his work on the forums.
Thank you very much for the info Kreuzung. Hopefully you get approval soon to reconfigure. It would be nice to have those items available again.
Very neat, I plan to give this a try tommorow
I turned all my batteries off with 5 kerbals in a crew tank, and showed no z02 depletion and no dead kerbals after 5 days elapsed time... Something doesnt compute...

I turned all my batteries off with 5 kerbals in a crew tank, and showed no z02 depletion and no dead kerbals after 5 days elapsed time... Something doesnt compute...

make sure, u install zoxygen parts properly! it has 3 parts: zoxy center module (the narrow one), a battery and a solar panel. please notice that if u don't have all the mods updated to 0.17 the mod might may not work properly. big blue batterie have 800 unit cap, one crew consumes 0.0006 unit.
I have used it before, and i deactivated batteries and nuclear batteries, then hit time warp. there was an SAS between the crew tank and the ZO2 control unit. could that be the problem

DynaVolt Panel issue

I modded the panels as mentioned in the Folding Panels Guide

The panels turn towards the sun

But theyr behavior i like they are fixed - panels only collect power if i turn the whole ship - and the turning of the panels itself has no influence at all.

any suggestions ?
I have difficulty getting this plug in to work. I extracted the files to their directories but when I boot up the game it stops loading as "EPS Large Battery" and the game never boots.

I have difficulty getting this plug in to work. I extracted the files to their directories but when I boot up the game it stops loading as "EPS Large Battery" and the game never boots.

Not only is this mod not supported anymore, but this is a necro of a 6-month old post. The mod probably doesn't work with 0.19. as well, the config files have changed, and electricity is natively supported. Try to look for mods that have the prefix "[0.19]" next time

Not sure if this has resurfaced in the forum yet but this is the closest mod that works on 0.19 for me

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ioncross-crew-support-plugin/

Not sure if this has resurfaced in the forum yet but this is the closest mod that works on 0.19 for me

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ioncross-crew-support-plugin/

This one works fine with 0.19. I have it since 0.19 is out. Nice addition even so its not that hardcore like some previous life support mods but those have some issues with 0.19.
Dose this work in 0.20? Looks really cool I'd love to try it

God, no. This plugin has been dead for a long time.

Which sucks, because I enjoyed it. Never got into IonCross all that much, the models for the resource tanks were just ugly.
to be honest I think like amp-year should be combined with something like this.
